title: 820-3115-b powers up, starts loading os, then cuts power completely.
message:
This board did have liquid contact. Plenty of corrosion along the hinge edge of the board. 

replaced q5480 and repaired a trace between. pin 4 and pin 1 of r5481 

also repaired trace between r3896 and c3888

replaced f9700. 

Not sure where to look.

Hoping it isn't an smc issue

probelm happens with/without battery

with without bil

title: 820-3115-b powers up, starts loading os, then cuts power completely.
message:
Check if on SMC by pass still shuts down.....
Also try another ram memory, try one slot at a time...

title: 820-3115-b powers up, starts loading os, then cuts power completely.
message: Great idea i didn't even think about smc bypass.

title: 820-3115-b powers up, starts loading os, then cuts power completely.
message: Check Current Sense resistors in u7000 area

title: 820-3115-b powers up, starts loading os, then cuts power completely.
message: Disconnect keyboard to rule out a flaky power button. Corrosion under SMC also very likely.

title: 820-3115-b powers up, starts loading os, then cuts power completely.
message: Does the same thing with smc bypass, however after it crashed i unplugged and plugged back in and am presented with an efi password for the first time, Is it possible i have a corrupt efi? The customer did provide the proper password and it does accept it however it still crashes the same.

title: 820-3115-b powers up, starts loading os, then cuts power completely.
message: and more interestingly, with option held at boot it will crash before the boot menu.

title: 820-3115-b powers up, starts loading os, then cuts power completely.
message: I said to disconnect keyboard. Reflow SMC and inspect for corroded reistors.

title: 820-3115-b powers up, starts loading os, then cuts power completely.
message: Did test without keyboard connected. Did reflow the smc after removing underfill. Did replace any corroded resistors i could find. Too much time invested into that board, sold customer a replacement board.
